pullRequest.title: CB-9879 Allow option to not start datahub cluster automatically when …
pullRequest.bodyText:
…environment starts up
See detailed description in the commit message.

beforeCommit.message: CB-9879 Allow option to not start datahub cluster automatically when environment starts up

beforeCommit.message: CB-9879 Allow option to not start datahub cluster automatically when environment starts up

afterCommit.message: CB-9879 Allow option to not start datahub cluster automatically when environment starts up. We have now 2 type of this switch START_ALL or DO_NOT_START. START_ALL means the current behavioud when every DH starts with environment. DO_NOT_START means in case of environment start we will not start datahubs.

nodes.bodyText: is this a good package? I think it does not relate to telemetruy
